data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for The Meeting To Be Held On 10-02-2026 To Consider And Approve The Quarterly Unaudited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter Ended December 31 2025.
data.news_body: Regaal Resources Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 10/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve the quarterly unaudited financial results of the Company for the quarter ended December 31 2025.

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 (LODR)- Search Operation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015  We hereby inform you that officers of Directorate General of GST Intelligence (DGGI) Patna Zonal Unit has conducted a search operation at the Business premises of the Company. The details are attached herewith.

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 (LODR) -Updates
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg 30 of SEBI (LODR) Reg 2015 we hereby inform that the officer of the DGGI conducted a Search Operation under GST Law at the premises of the Company.

data.news_body: Reply to the Clarification sought on movement in the price of the Shares.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Regaal Resources Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Regaal Resources Ltd on October 24 2025 with reference to Movement in Volume.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Intimation For Change Of Corporate Identification Number ("CIN") Of Regaal Resources Limited
data.news_body: We hereby inform that pursuant to the listing of Equity Shares of the company on the Stock Exchanges the CIN of the company has been changed from U15100WB2012PLC171600 to L15100WB2012PLC171600 and the same is updated in the MCA.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 9Th September 2025
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations 2015) we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the company in its meeting held today has considered and approved the Unaudited Standalone  Financial Results  along with Limited Review Report thereon for the quarter ended June 30 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Consideration And Approval Of The Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30 2025
data.news_body: Regaal Resources Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 09/09/2025 inter alia to consider and approve  the Unaudited Financial Results for the first Quarter ended June 30 2025

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 8(2) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Prohibition Of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: Regaal Resources Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Code of Practices and Procedures for fair disclosure of Unpublished Price Sensitive Information framed under Regulation 8 (2) of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30(5) Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligation And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.
data.news_body: Regaal Resources Limited has informed the exchange regarding names of Key Managerial Personnel of the Company to determine materiality of event or information for the purpose  of making disclosure to the Stock Exchange under Regulation 30 of Securities Exchange Board of India (Listing obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 7(1) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligation And Disclosure Requirements Regulation) 2015
data.news_body: Regaal Resources Limited has informed the Exchange regarding appointment of MUFG Intime Private Limited (formally known as Link Intime Private Limited) as the Registrar and Share Transfer Agent and continues to be the Registrar and Share Transfer Agent.

data.caption: Appointment Of Company Secretary And Compliance Officer
data.news_body: This is to inform you that Regaal Resources Limited had appointed Mr. Tinku Kumar Gupta as Company Secretary and Compliance officer and he continues to be the Compliance Officer of the Company under Regulation 6(1) of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirement) Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Regaal Resources Limited has informed the exchange that the Trading Window will remain closed from 20th August 2025 till the end of 48 hours after declaration of Unaudited Financial Result of the Company for the quarter ended June 30 2025.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Regaal Resources Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from August 20 2025 the equity shares of Regaal Resources Ltd (Scrip Code: 544485) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250819- dated August 19 2025.
